description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed.

You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point. Each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] saving throw. You regain Hit Points equal to half the total damage dealt.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes void damage equal to half its level.

Failure The target takes void damage equal to its level.

Critical Failure The target takes void damage equal to double its level.

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. Here we have used the better of your class or spell DC.
